channel.title: links on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in links on Konigi

item.title: Open UI
item.description: Community project to standardize naming of UI components.

item.title: Design Critique on a Remote Team
item.description: Tips for running remote design critique.

item.title: Ethnio UX Research Incentive Calculator
item.description: Estimator for paying incentives to user research participants.

item.title: Stonly: Step by step guides
item.description: A widget for creating guides and explainers.

item.title: Tota11y: An Accessibility Visualization Toolkit
item.description: A tool to find accessibility issues

item.title: 1 1 1 1 dns service
item.description: A DNS service created for a more private Internet.

item.title: RGBA feColorMatrix
item.description: An SVG filter that changes colors based on a transformation matrix.

item.title: Good Microcopy
item.description: Good Micrcopy is a showcase of clear, concise and sometimes quirky copy.

item.title: Storyboarder
item.description: Wonderunit’s Storyboarder is a free storyboarding application for the Mac that lets you visualize a story quickly. Quickly sketch your stick figures, then create and show animatics to others.

item.title: Graphic Design Basics
item.description: Designers Ellen Lupton and Jennifer Cole Phillips, authors of the book Graphic Design, The New Basics and Directors of the MFA Program at Maryland Institute College of Art offer a free 35 minute Skillshare course walking through 5 basic principles of graphic design. The course is a quick primer on design principles suited to various visual design projects.

item.title: explainshell: Unix Manual pages explained visually
item.description: Idan Kamara's explainshell displays Ubuntu's manpage repository visually like a schematic, allowing you to highlight parts of a commands parts (command, arguments, options) and view a callout that describes what the part does. http://explainshell.com/explain?cmd=tar%20xzvf%20archive.tar.gz

item.title: Zerply Email Notifications Settings
item.description: Simple things appeal to me. I like the simplicity of being able to usubscribe immediately. Zerply goes the extra mile and not only gives me options to never get email notifications via links in the notification itself, but also to change the frequency of updates. Nice. 1. Email notification from Zerply.2. Update frequency settings in the bottom. Click and you're done. http://zerply.com/

item.title: Flickr Sharing
item.description: Flickr have added a sharing interface for their photos and videos. Presumably this is because of the introduction of videos into the ecosystem. The interface is provided via an unobtrusive link that uses AJAX to display contextual menus when clicked. Prior to the introduction of this interface, users had to go to click the "All Sizes" link to find URLs for the item. 1. "Share This" button appears to the right of photo or video title.
